name: Ensemble Online
blurb: Ensemble Online is an open world, sandbox MMORTS with RPG elements. Runs on Windows, Mac, and Linux.

rewards.reward: A closed beta account and special forum access to discuss your ideas directly with the developers. You'll be able to play before the masses and have unprecedented contact with the developers to shape the game.\r\n\r\nIn addition, you will receive Golden Platemail, in-game armor that is only available here on Kickstarter.

All previous reward tiers plus: We'll send out a personalized tweet thanking you to our 1000+ followers on twitter (@ensembleonline).\r\n\r\nYou'll receive an exclusive showboat-worthy in-game panda suit, available only here on Kickstarter. To match your panda digs, you will also receive an exclusive weapon: the "Bamboo Staff." And because you're awesome, we'll throw in $25 worth of Cash-shop currency.

All previous reward tiers plus: \r\n\r\nA special town will be created in the game and only Kickstarters who pledge this amount or higher will have access. The town will include an exclusive shop, farming grounds, and mob spawns. You will also receive $50 in Cash-shop currency ($75 total including previous tier).

All previous reward tiers plus: A concept art print signed by the entire team, "The Golden Axe," an epic in-game battleaxe available only here on Kickstarter, $100 in Cash-shop currency ($175 total including previous tiers), and an Ensemble Online promotional t-shirt (See the bottom of the page for an example).

All previous reward tiers plus: a shrine will be created in-game with plaques memorializing the names of everyone who pledged this tier or higher. Additionally, your name will show up in shiny gold! Gold will be a name color never again offered. You will have exclusive access to our restricted patch staging server. This means 1 - 2 weeks before patches are released to the other beta testers, you will have a chance to toy around with the new features and give your advance input. Finally, you will receive a copy of "The Legend of Cidona," the back story to Ensemble's unique world, in hardcover, signed by the author. See the book at: http://www.blurb.com/bookstore/detail/2241706

All previous reward tiers plus: An Ensemble-ized version of you will be custom designed by our art team and placed in the game as an NPC. You will be able to customize your NPC's name and what they say to players. We'll send you a high-resolution, signed, print version of your character as well as digital images. You'll also receive 50 Beta keys you can give out to your closest friends or distribute on your favorite forum to look generally badass.

All previous reward tiers plus: Our writers will collaborate with you to create an epic backstory for your character (the one from the previous tier, yo) who will be forever immortalized into Ensemble canon.  He or she will be featured in Ensemble's next novel, "The Legend of Cidona Volume II: Bragus." When published, you will receive 5 signed copies of the book to do with what you'd like. And the cherry on top: you'll receive a large canvas print of promotional artwork signed by the entire team (12" x 24")

All previous reward tiers plus: 

You will get YOUR OWN TOWN, complete with houses, farms, NPCS, guard towers and YOUR OWN PERSONAL SHOP! No more walking back to the main town like commonfolk.

Our design team will work with you to customize the town to your liking and decide how near or remote you want to build it.

All previous reward tiers plus: Your name will be featured on the login screen of the game FOREVER. We will fly you out to meet the Ensemble team in an all expenses paid trip to discuss your ideas for the game. We'll collaborate with you to design future skills, buildings, units, features, weapons, and plot points. While on site, our artists will work with you to design your own custom mount.
